participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Nostalgic and creative, enjoys expressing herself through art and music.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80s. i also like old school hip hop.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and practical, values family and has a strong work ethic.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
